summary: I can't help myself, when I hear an English accent I automatically orientate towards the person speaking.  And, usually, because I make eye contact and smile, get a response.  And thus I start either a brief chat with another English speaker, sharing a few moments...
title: Bonjour, Hello

summary: As part of my job inspecting houses, I also assess the household's fire safety.  Often, important products like fire extinguishers
title: The Power of Passion

summary:
Two students have created a demo of a smart-glasses app that performs automatic facial recognition and then information lookups.  Kind of obvious—something similar was done in 2011—but the sort of creepy demo that gets attention.

title: Auto-Identification Smart Glasses
